price: Tí ẹ bá fi lè tẹ̀lé abara kan bí irú yín, dájúdájú ẹ mà ti di ẹni òfò nìyẹn.
arabic: وَلَئِنۡ أَطَعۡتُم بَشَرٗا مِّثۡلَكُمۡ إِنَّكُمۡ إِذٗا لَّخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wala-in aṭaʿtum basharan mith'lakum innakum idhan lakhāsirūna
